name: 还有一个小愿望 One More Wish
name_original: 还有一个小愿望 One More Wish
description:
Wander, jump, and fly upon the clouds, collects stars to grow your energy, help guffy villagers with their wishes, and finally rerun the abandoned ferris wheel. Life is not of great goals or loud slogans but of negligible yet sparkling wishes.
Press Esc for key operation
